typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> moviesCosmos
moviesCosmos alterRow(deleteIf(titlekey=='Wanted')) ~> DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/titlekey'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		movies,
		titlekey,
		id
	)) ~> sink1
